Ok so I just wanted to provide an update as of today, July 13, 2011, this torrent is working perfectly. Installed its on a Mac OS X 10.6.8 via VMWare Fusion 3.1.3. All drivers and updates are good. 

My copy of VMWare Fusion was taken from here: 

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6444050/VMware_Fusion_3.1.3_MacOSX_incl._keygen

I will continue seeding for 30days. 

Much appreciation goes out to Slickinator and TPB community.

As of July 24, 2011... Upgraded Windows Vista Premium x32. Worked fine. The only problem is that the upgrade hangs at a certain percentage for about 2 hours, but JUST WAIT and it will work itself out. The Upgrade installation took a few hours and did okay.

Do NOT update to Service Pack 1. It will catch you with Windows Genuine Advantage, which checks if this is a genuine copy of Windows.

DO use RemoveWat, as Slickinator advised. I neglected to do this at first because it was tagged by Lavasoft Ad-Aware as malware. The tag was just a false positive. Use RemoveWat to get rid of Genuine Advantage. 

A serial number is included, but I never used it.
thanks bud...it worked perfectly on my 6 year old amd quad core, 4gb ram system.
